title: Getting banned for leaving a troll game
body:
uhh im owning top lane. Bot loses tower in 9 min, jungler fuckn sucks, and mid went afk.
Why do i have to sit here for 35 fuckn min when team wont surrender. 
This game is prison. I broke out of prison and smoked a blunt. Now im demoted.
I honestly never get mad from losses even espescially if its my fault. But riot needs to change somthing i dont like feeling helpless sorry. Do i come back in a year and see if things have changed?
